FuncDef: The display igmp-snooping port-info listening interface command displays member interface information of multicast groups on specified Router QinQ stacking or mapping sub-interfaces.
CLIs: display igmp-snooping port-info listening interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } [ vsi <vsi-name> ] [ group-address <group-address> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of a QinQ sub-interface.
-

Specifies the number of a QinQ sub-interface.
-

Specifies the name of a QinQ sub-interface.
-

Displays member interface information of multicast groups in a specified VSI.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Displays member interface information of a multicast group.
The value ranges from 224.0.1.0 to 239.255.255.255, in dotted decimal notation.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display igmp-snooping port-info listening interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/1.1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To query member interface information of multicast groups on specified QinQ stacking or mapping sub-interfaces, run the display igmp-snooping port-info listening interface command.
